attributes.action: provide proper funding to our armed forces and put a stop to cuts to the defence budget.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this is to gordon brown to put a stop to the plans to cut the defence budgets and to supply proper funding to allow our armed forces to be equipped and provided for properly. the ongoing cuts to an already struggling institution continues to be a travesty that must be stopped. this is echoed in the increasing number of recorded verdicts of unlawful killing in soliders deaths who have died due to consistent failings to equip our troops. you request our armed forces to protect us and continue to serve queen and country then you must ensure more funds are available and serve your public.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/support-Forces/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
